title: About the -d <dbSNP VCF>, is it necessary?
body:
Hi,
    dv-trio is a good tools for variants calling!And there is not have a golden standard database as an input in other species. Like me, i research on plant genome. How could we create a dbSNP VCF file?
Thank you!
Bests,
Nan

title: Is it possible to run the pipeline on a cohort of 20 trios?
body: I have a cohort of 20 trio comprising of 60 sample (20x3=60). If I want use this pipeline should I run the pipeline on each trios (Total 20 run) or are there any option to deal with trio cohort data?

title: targeted seq
body: Thank you very much for developing this useful code. Does it work on targeted sequencing data too?
